results.title: [Effect of combination antihypertensive therapy on circadian blood pressure and metabolic parameters in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: AIM: To assess effect of combined antihypertensive therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on circadian blood pressure (BP), @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@), @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@) and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@).

citations.NLM: Statsenko ME, Derevianchenko MV, Pastukhova OR. [Effect of combination antihypertensive therapy on circadian blood pressure and metabolic parameters in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus]. Kardiologiia. 2014;54(11):20-4. PMID: 25902654
